definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: We have an orbiting electron but a stationary nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 我们有一个在轨运行的电子和一个静止原子核。

sentences.english: It has a nucleus at the center charged positively.
sentences.chinese: 中心有个带正电的原子核。

sentences.english: What is the charge of the nucleus?
sentences.chinese: 原子核的电荷量是多少？

sentences.english: If the nucleus of an atom of a heavy element is split, a large amount of energy is released.
sentences.chinese: 分裂一个重原素的原子核，会释放出很大的能量。

sentences.english: But, I've got a nucleus with 11 protons in it.
sentences.chinese: 但是我知道它的原子核中有11个质子。

sentences.english: The atom is made up of a nucleus with negative electrons revolving around it.
sentences.chinese: 原子是由原子核和绕核旋转的若干负电子组成。

sentences.english: And, here, I've got 17 protons in the nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 对于氯，它的原子核里有17个质子。

sentences.english: Considerable efforts for nuclear structure studies have been intensively devoted to the superdeformed(SD) nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 超形变原子核的研究是原子核结构领域的重要前沿。

sentences.english: Considerable efforts for nuclear structure studies have been intensively devoted to the superdeformed(SD) nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 超形变原子核的研究是原子核结构领域的重要前沿。

sentences.english: Nucleon density distribution is one of the most important characters of an atomic nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 核子密度分布是原子核的一个重要性质。

sentences.english: The heavier the nucleus, the smaller the K's value.
sentences.chinese: 而且原子核越重，K因子的值越小。

sentences.english: But accelerators could potentially produce nuclear fusion, which fuses atomic nuclei together.
sentences.chinese: 而加速器可能产生核聚变，将原子核融合在一起。

sentences.english: 14 seconds later, the temperature became 3 billion degrees, forming the first deuterium atom.
sentences.chinese: 14秒后，温度是30亿度，第一个氘原子核形成了。

sentences.english: In this process the nucleus breaks up into two intermediate-sized nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 在这种过程中，那个原子核分裂成两个中等大小的核。

sentences.english: A deuterium atom is a hydrogen with an extra neutron in its nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 重氢是原子核中多一个中子的氢。

sentences.english: This makes sense intuitively as well, Ze because z is just the atomic number.
sentences.chinese: 他还发现原子核，的电荷是正的。

definition: neutrino (particle physics)/also written 微中子[wei1 zhong1 zi3]
